original: dvāsaṭṭhiyā ca suttehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
analyzed: dvāsaṭṭhiyā ca suttehi paṭimaṇḍitam bhāṇa vāra sata parimāṇam saṃyuttanikāyam nāma pāvacanam saṃgāyiṃsu

original: Pucchā – saṃyuttanikāye ca āvuso sagāthāvaggo nidānavaggo khandhavaggo saḷāyatanavaggo mahāvaggoti pañcasaṃyuttappakaraṇāni, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ saṃyuttappakaraṇaṃ te saṃgāyiṃsu.

original: Vissajjanā – pañcasu bhante saṃyuttappakaraṇesu paṭhamaṃ sagāthāvaggasaṃyuttappakaraṇaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

analyzed: pucchā devatā saṃyutte pi āvuso naḷa vagga ādayaḥ aṭṭha vaggāḥ ogha taraṇa sutta ādīni ca ekāsīti suttāni tesu paṭhamam kataram vaggam kataram ca suttam
